meanings: (흥미·관심을 가지고 봄) [명사] sightseeing, [동사] see, watch, (관광하다) see the sights (of), (돌아다니며) look around

vlive.korean: 구경. We can watch. 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE SHOWCASE #3 TT
[그럼 다시 구경하러 가볼까요?] [Shall we get back to enjoy the view?] View video TWICE : 나연 TV “나연이 하와이 갔나연?” EP.01
vlive.english: [Shall we get back to enjoy the view?]

vlive.korean: 거의 막 여기서 - 멀리서 구경만... It was almost... - We watched your graduation in a distant place. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 제목 모하지? 모아지! 2
vlive.english: It was almost... - We watched your graduation in a distant place.

vlive.korean: 나도 구경 가도 돼? Can I go as well? 듣기 View video 대나무숲TV (BAMBOONETWORK) : 가장 지고 싶지 않은 상대를 만났다 [웹드라마_어서오세요, 마녀상점] - EP.04
구경시켜줄까? Do you want to look around? 듣기 View video 와우티비(WAWtv) : [리얼타임] 지금 이 순간 일어나는 일 SPUNK(스펑크) EP3-3
vlive.english: Do you want to look around?

examples.korean: The onlookers stood aside to let the paramedics through. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 구경하던 사람들이 구급요원들이 지나가도록 비켜 서 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The onlookers stood aside to let the paramedics through. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Has anyone shown you round yet? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 벌써 누가 (당신에게) 구경을 시켜 드리던가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Has anyone shown you round yet? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We sat outside a cafe, watching the world go by. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 카페 밖에 앉아 사람들을 구경했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We sat outside a cafe, watching the world go by. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A large crowd had gathered round to watch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사방에서 많은 사람들이 구경을 하려고 몰려들어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A large crowd had gathered round to watch. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Passers-by simply looked on as he was attacked. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지나가던 사람들이 그가 공격당하는 것을 그저 구경만 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Passers-by simply looked on as he was attacked. Add to Wordbook
